page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: I wake up at about 6.45am and have a hot bath. I then have something to eat, perhaps a bacon roll and a glass of milk. I leave for school at about 8.30am. I take a slow walk up to school after calling for a friend. We line up outside the door at 9.00am when the bell goes. Our interval is from 10.40am until 10.55am and we play games at this time. We have an hour for lunch between 12.45pm and 1.45pm. During this time I go home for lunch and return at about 1.15pm to play hide and seek or maybe netball with my friends. The afternoon school begins at 1.45pm and lasts until 3.15pm, when we leave for home. Usually I play outside for a while until tea time at about 5.00pm and then go to play outside again until 9.00pm. At roughly 9.30pm I wash and go to bed.
